block.p: DRUM-Francis. Age 93, of River Edge, New Jersey, on September 22nd, 1998. Devoted husband of the late Margaret (nee Clarke). Loving father of Francis P. Riley of River Edge, Peggi Drum of NYC, and Bernadette Drum of Newton, MA. Dear brother of the late Mary Ellen, Katherine, James, Patrick, and Anne. Adored grandfather of Christopher and Keith Riley. Funeral mass is on Saturday 10AM at St. Peter the Apostle R.C. Church in River Edge. Family will receive friends at the Beaugard Funeral Home, 869 Kinderkamack Road, River Edge, NJ., on Thursday and Friday 2-4, 7-9PM
